name: honorable-monorepo
description: An extensible React component librarie for 2022 and beyond

scripts.dev:packages: npm run dev:honorable & npm run dev:honorable-theme-default & npm run dev:honorable-theme-honorable
scripts.dev:designer: npm run link:all && (cd designer && npm run start:watch)
scripts.dev:landing: npm run link:packages && npm run link:designer && (cd designer && npm run start:watch)
scripts.link:packages: npm run link:honorable && npm run link:honorable-theme-defaul
scripts.link:designer: (cd designer && npm link honorable && npm link honorable-theme-default && npm link honorable-theme-honorable)
scripts.link:landing: (cd landing && npm link honorable && npm link honorable-theme-default && npm link honorable-theme-honorable)

author: David HÃ©rault <dherault@gmail.com> (https://github.com/dherault)
